name: Sopa de Tortilla
description: A hearty tomato-based soup with crispy tortilla strips, avocado, cheese, and a touch of lime.

name: Nachos with Salsa Fresca
description: Crispy tortilla chips topped with fresh salsa made from diced tomatoes, onions, cilantro, and lime juice.

name: Flautas
description: Crispy rolled flour tortillas filled with seasoned beans and cheese, served with guacamole and sour cream.

name: Shrimp Ceviche
description: Chilled shrimp marinated in lime juice, mixed with diced cucumbers, red onions, cilantro, and mango. Served with plantain chips.

name: Chorizo Quesadillas
description: Grilled quesadillas stuffed with spicy chorizo and melted cheese, served with chipotle aioli for dipping.

name: Tacos de Pescado
description: Battered and fried fish fillets served in soft corn tortillas with cabbage slaw, chipotle mayo, and lime wedges.

name: Tamale con Rajas
description: Steamed cornmeal dumpling filled with roasted poblano pepper strips and cheese, topped with salsa verde.

name: Tostadas de Tinga
description: Crispy corn tostadas topped with tinga de pollo (shredded chicken in tomato-chipotle sauce), lettuce, and queso fresco.

name: Chapulines Tacos
description: Tacos filled with crunchy roasted grasshoppers, guacamole, and pickled red onions. A unique delicacy!

name: Vegetarian Burrito Bowl
description: A hearty bowl filled with cilantro-lime rice, black beans, grilled vegetables, and topped with avocado and salsa.

name: Enchiladas de Mole
description: Corn tortillas rolled and filled with tender chicken, then smothered in rich mole sauce and garnished with sesame seeds.

name: Taco Sampler
description: Sample three different tacos of your choice, served with Mexican street corn and lime wedges.

name: Carnitas Platter
description: Slow-cooked pork carnitas served with warm tortillas, salsa, guacamole, and a side of refried beans.

name: Sopes de Barbacoa
description: Thick handmade corn tortillas topped with tender barbacoa beef, onions, cilantro, and a drizzle of spicy salsa.

name: Chiles en Nogada
description: Roasted poblano peppers stuffed with a mixture of ground beef and fruits, topped with walnut cream sauce and pomegranate seeds.

name: Birria Tacos
description: Tacos filled with slow-cooked birria (spiced stewed beef) and served with a side of consomm√© for dipping.

name: Molotes
description: Fried masa patties filled with black beans, cheese, and your choice of chorizo or mushrooms, topped with crema and queso fresco.

name: Elote Asado
description: Grilled corn on the cob slathered in mayonnaise, cotija cheese, chili powder, and lime juice.

name: Arroz Rojo
description: Mexican-style red rice cooked with tomatoes, garlic, and onions.

name: Tamarindo Margarita
description: A tangy and sweet margarita made with tamarind pulp, tequila, and lime juice.

name: Jamaica Agua Fresca
description: Hibiscus-infused water, lightly sweetened and served over ice.

name: Mexican Hot Chocolate
description: Rich and creamy hot chocolate with a hint of cinnamon and vanilla, topped with whipped cream.

name: Churros
description: Crispy fried dough pastries dusted with cinnamon sugar and served with a side of chocolate dipping sauce.

name: Tres Leches Cake
description: A moist sponge cake soaked in three types of milk, topped with whipped cream and fresh strawberries.

name: Flan
description: Creamy caramel custard with a silky smooth texture and a sweet caramel sauce drizzle.

name: Mexican Fried Ice Cream
description: Vanilla ice cream coated in a crispy cinnamon-sugar shell, topped with whipped cream and honey.
